title: Percent of KU and Big Publishers on Amazon: New Feature!!

tactics.name: Category Competition Analysis
tactics.description: Authors can assess market competition by checking KU and big publisher dominance in categories using Publisher Rocket's new feature.
steps: Review percentages of KU and big publisher books in top 100
Decide KU participation based on competition data
source_quotes: Authors can now look at their respective categories and see whether or not it's predominantly held by large Publishing Company

heuristics.name: KU Dominance Heuristic
heuristics.condition: If a category has high KU percentage, authors should consider KU participation
source_quotes: Seeing a large percentage of books in KU in your categories can help you with your decision of whether to enter KU or to go wide

claims.statement: KU books receive an indirect benefit on Amazon
source_quotes: KU books get an indirect benefit on Amazon which I've covered previously
